preface.title: Preface
preface.p: This book is designed for use in a university course for students who are not at the Putnam Fellow level, but who aspire to compete in the Putnam. If you belong to the faculty of a college or university, you may request a pdf with solutions to many of the problems in this book. Do this by sending me proof in the form of a URL listing you as faculty that includes an email address that matches the email address of your message. Send it to kenneth_levasseur@uml.edu.
